wikipedia_page.main: Rupesh Mahesh Amin (born 20 August 1977) is an English first-class cricketer and List A cricketer who played First-class games for  Surrey County Cricket Club and Leicestershire County Cricket Club. He played all his List A games for Surrey.   His highest score in First-class cricket of 12 came when playing for Surrey in the match against Leicestershire.  His best bowling of 4/87 came when playing for Surrey in the match against Somerset County Cricket Club.His Highest score in List A cricket of 0* came when playing for Surrey against Northamptonshire County Cricket Club.He also played a total of 63 games for Surrey and Leicestershire second XI.  and 39 Second XI cup games for surrey and Leicestershire second XI.
